overview: From the streets of Bristol to the caverns of London and beyond, BanksyDoc finds the truths and explores the impact that the worldâ€™s most famous graffiti artist has had on the art world, on the expression of protest and satire, and on the perception of what you can do with a spray can and a stencil. Furthermore, this documentary explores the highly active art collector's world and how the celebrity factor shockingly influences value.
title: DocoBANKSY
